column4: Even the liberal New York Times is now saying children are not significant spreaders of COVID-19. Its about time we open all of Maryland’s schools - anything less is harming our children and kowtowing to the teachers’ unions. https://t.co/o1I0oIGprO

Great to be on the lower shore yesterday! Started out at the OC commercial fishing harbor to discuss federal regulation of the seafood industry and the importance of horshoe crabs for developing a safe COVID vaccine with local watermen. Thanks to Sea Born Seafood for hosting! https://t.co/UV0BT4EQjM

Hand washing is a very effective way to stop the spread of viruses. Especially during this pandemic, let's be sure to practice good hygiene for the protection of ourselves and others. #KeepHandsClean 

https://t.co/f8ZtNnn1EI

Great news in Maryland, no COVID deaths in the last 24 hours. As the data keeps coming in it grows ever more clear that it's time to open schools and all businesses.

Thanks to President Trump and #OperationWarpSpeed we have dramatically reduced the fatality rate of COVID-19. https://t.co/tY94EpP59j

Once healthcare workers and high risk populations get the vaccine #IWILLTAKEIT

#OWS skips no steps-rather billions in federal investment are allowing all required trials to take place at the same time, in addition to producing millions of doses of a potential vaccine in advance. https://t.co/TNu6dzYNCh

On top of vaccine development, #OperationWarpSpeed is enabling the rapid roll out of safe and effective treatments for COVID-19, and already two are FDA authorized. Thanks to #OWS we have drastically cut the COVID-19 mortality rate and are improving outcomes across the board. https://t.co/4QUsvwvpz2
The Trump Administration's #OperationWarpSpeed is harnessing the power of science and American ingenuity to produce a safe and effective COVID-19 vaccine in record time. https://t.co/wfDexkdMup

This morning, the GOP Doctors Caucus met with @SecAzar at HHS to discuss prescription drug prices and the cost of health insurance. We are committed to lowering the cost of health care for the American people. https://t.co/8womODp1tf

@POTUS' decision to expand access to Association Health Plans is a win for small businesses. This rule increases access to more affordable health plans for millions of Americans priced out of the expensive, failing ACA exchanges, and protects patients with preexisting conditions.

Last night, ⁦@HouseAppropsGOP⁩ voted to provide $73 million in funding for the Chesapeake Bay Program in FY2019. The success of #MD01 depends on a healthy Bay, and I am thankful for my colleagues’ continued support of the Chesapeake Bay Program. https://t.co/NVLDlyrKiF

Education, prevention, and treatment are all critical factors in preventing the further spread of this terrible epidemic.
